trans-unit.source: Provides an object that enables two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls to form a connection.
trans-unit.target: Gir et objekt som gjør det mulig for to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller for å opprette en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan arves.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a connection is a link or association between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (or other server or user) controls that enables them to share data.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontroll-angi en tilkobling er en kobling eller en tilordning mellom to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(eller andre server eller bruker) kontroller som de kan dele dataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This ability to share data allows connected controls to be used in ways that exceed the functionality offered by the isolated controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne muligheten til å dele dataene kan tilkoblet kontrolltypene som skal brukes på en måte som overskrider funksjonaliteten i isolerte kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one control provides postal code data, and another control can read that data and provide local weather information based on the postal code, then the connected capability of the two controls provides more value to users.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis én kontroll gir Postnummerdata, og en annen kontroll kan lese dataene og angi været informasjonen basert på postnummeret gir deretter tilkoblet funksjonaliteten til de to kontrollene flere verdien til brukere.

trans-unit.source: To extend this example, other controls could be created that also display information based on a postal code, such as a control with links to local news, and all these controls that can work with postal code data could share data with the single control that provides a postal code.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utvide dette eksemplet, kan du opprette andre kontroller at også viser informasjon basert på et postnummer, for eksempel en kontroll med koblinger til lokale nyheter, og alle disse kontroller kan arbeide med postnummerdata kan dele dataene med enkelt kontrollen som gir et postnummer.

trans-unit.source: End users of Web Parts applications can create and manage connections between all such compatible controls directly from a Web browser, using the standard connections user interface (UI) provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control, or using a custom UI provided by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Sluttbrukere av webdeler programmer kan opprette og administrere tilkoblinger mellom slike kompatibel Kontroller direkte fra en nettleser, ved hjelp av standard tilkoblinger brukergrensesnittet (UI) som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>kontrollen eller bruke en egendefinert Brukergrensesnittet som er angitt av en utvikler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: This WebPartConnection class overview is a general statement of the basic details for creating a connection.
trans-unit.target: Denne WebPartConnection klassen oversikt er Generelt sett av grunnleggende informasjon for å opprette en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: For more on specific components and requirements involved in creating connections, see [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), or see the reference classes and code examples mentioned in the following discussion.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om bestemte komponenter og krav som er involvert i oppretting av tilkoblinger, kan du se [oversikt over webdeler tilkoblinger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), eller referanse klassene og kodeeksempler nevnt i følgende diskusjoner.

trans-unit.source: There are several fundamental aspects of a Web Parts connection: - Two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere grunnleggende aspektene ved tilkobling webdeler: – to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls.
trans-unit.target: Hver webdeler tilkobling består av to kontroller.

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a control to participate in more than one connection simultaneously, but every single connection consists of exactly two controls.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig for en kontroll som skal delta i mer enn én samtidig, men hver enkelt tilkobling består av nøyaktig to kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The controls can derive directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, or they can be other server controls, including ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollene kan utledes direkte fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>basisklasse, eller de kan være andre serverkontroller, inkludert ASP.NET kontroller egendefinerte serverkontroller og brukerkontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, if placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, are automatically wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, which enables them to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class and function as run-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller ikke avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>klasse Hvis satt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>sone, automatisk står i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>objektet ved kjøretid, som gjør det mulig for dem å arve fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>klassen og funksjonen som kjøretid <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Controls residing in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: -Kontroller som ligger i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and any other type of server control must reside in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone to be able to participate in Web Parts connections (and most other Web Parts features).
trans-unit.target: Begge <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller og andre typer serverkontroll må befinne seg i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>sone skal kunne delta i webdeler-tilkoblinger (og de fleste funksjonene andre webdeler).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Consumers and providers.
trans-unit.target: -Forbrukere og leverandører.

trans-unit.source: In every Web Parts connection there are two controls: a provider of data and a consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes to kontroller i hver webdeler tilkobling: en leverandør med data og forbrukeren av dataene.

trans-unit.source: The provider furnishes data to the consumer through a specified callback method that returns data in the form of an interface.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren inneholder data til forbrukeren via en angitt tilbakeringing metode som returnerer data i form av et grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: (For an example of how to create and specify the callback method, see the Example section of this topic.) This callback method is known as a provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: (Se eksempel-delen i dette emnet for et eksempel på hvordan du oppretter og angi metoden tilbakeringing.) Denne metoden for tilbakeringing kalles et leverandøren connection point.

trans-unit.source: The details of this connection point (its "friendly" name, an ID, and the type of the returned interface) are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object associated with the provider control.
trans-unit.target: Detaljene for denne tilkoblingen punkt ("" visningsnavnet IDen og hva slags grensesnittet returnerte) finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objektet som er knyttet til leverandøren kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: The consumer receives the data through a specified method that can accept an instance of the interface.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren mottar dataene gjennom en angitt metode som kan godta en forekomst av grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: This method is known as a consumer connection point, and the details of the connection point (name, ID, and type of interface) are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object associated with the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles tilkoblingspunktet en forbruker, og detaljene for tilkoblingspunktet (navn ID og type grensesnitt) finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>tilknyttet Forbrukerkontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: - Compatible controls or a valid transformer.
trans-unit.target: -Kompatibel kontroller eller en gyldig transformering.

trans-unit.source: For a connection to work, the consumer and provider must either be compatible (meaning that their specified connection point methods can work with the same type of interface), or there must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object capable of translating the type offered by the provider into a type understood by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: For en tilkobling til å kjøre de forbrukeren og leverandøren må være kompatibel (betyr at de angitte tilkoblingen punkt metodene kan arbeide med samme type grensesnittet), eller det kan være en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>objekt kan oversette type til typen forstått av forbrukeren som tilbys av leverandøren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: - A WebPartConnection object.
trans-unit.target: – En WebPartConnection-objekt.

trans-unit.source: For a connection to exist, there must be an instance of the WebPartConnection class that contains references to the provider and consumer controls, along with the details of their connection points.
trans-unit.target: For en tilkobling til finnes, må det være en forekomst av klassen WebPartConnection som inneholder referanser til leverandøren og forbrukeren kontroller, sammen med detaljene for sine tilkoblingen punkt.

trans-unit.source: If the provider and consumer are incompatible and instead use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to connect, the connection references the transformer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis leverandør og forbrukeren er ikke kompatible og bruker i stedet en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>objektet som kobles til tilkoblingen refererer til transformeringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: - A means of establishing the connection.
trans-unit.target: – En metode for oppretting av tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: After compatible consumer and provider controls have been properly designed with connection point methods and placed in a zone, and a WebPartConnection object is available, the last basic step necessary is to initiate the connection.
trans-unit.target: Når kompatibel forbrukeren og leverandøren kontroller er riktig utformet med connection point metoder og plassert i en sone, og et WebPartConnection objekt er tilgjengelig, er den siste grunnleggende trinn nødvendig å starte tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: One way this can happen is for users to create the connection through the UI.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skyldes gjøres for brukere å opprette tilkoblingen via Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: If you place an `<asp:connectionszone>` element on the page, and the other required components for a connection are in place, at run time a user can switch the page into connect display mode, click a connect verb on the verbs menu of either the provider or consumer, and a connection UI (based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control) will appear.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter en `<asp:connectionszone>` element på siden, og den andre nødvendige komponentene for en tilkobling er på plass, på kjøretidspunktet en bruker kan bytte siden i koble visningsmodus, klikker du et koble verb på verb-menyen for leverandøren eller forbrukeren og en tilkobling Brukergrensesnittet (basert på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>kontrollen) vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: Through this UI, the user can initiate the connection.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan starte tilkoblingen i dette Grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: Another way to initiate the connection is to do it programmatically.
trans-unit.target: En annen måte å starte tilkoblingen er å gjøre det programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: In either case, whether through the UI or programmatically, the underlying method that initiates the connection is the same.
trans-unit.target: Uansett om via Brukergrensesnittet eller programmatisk underliggende metode som starter tilkoblingen er den samme.

trans-unit.source: The application calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method (or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method if using a transformer) on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, passing to it the provider, the consumer, and their respective connection point objects, and the method returns a WebPartConnection object.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjons-kall i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>metoden (eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>metoden hvis du bruker en transformering) på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollere, sende til den leverandøren, forbrukeren og de respektive tilkoblingen punkt objektene, og metoden returnerer et WebPartConnection-objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnection class defines an object that encapsulates the essential details of a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartConnection definerer et objekt som innkapsler viktige detaljene for en tilkobling mellom to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The class consists almost entirely of properties related to the details of a particular connection.
trans-unit.target: Klassen nesten utelukkende består av egenskaper relatert til detaljene for en bestemt tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Several properties concern the consumer control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: Flere egenskaper gjelder forbrukeren kontrollen i en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A> property references the consumer control itself, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A> property references the consumer's ID.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A>Egenskapen refererer forbrukeren kontrollen seg selv, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A>egenskapen refererer til de forbrukeren-ID.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object, which contains the details of the consumer's connection point, is referenced by the consumer's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>-objektet som inneholder detaljer om de forbrukeren tilkoblingspunktet, refererer til forbrukeren <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property references the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>egenskapen refererer til IDen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>

trans-unit.source: All these consumer-related connection properties must have a value assigned to them to create a connection.
trans-unit.target: Alle disse forbrukeren-relaterte tilkoblingsegenskapene må ha en verdi som er tilordnet til å opprette en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnection class also has several properties that relate to the provider control in a connection, and these correspond to the properties for a consumer.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartConnection også har flere egenskaper som er knyttet til leverandøren kontrollen i en tilkobling, og disse samsvarer med egenskaper for en forbruker.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A> property references the provider control itself, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID%2A> property references its ID.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A>Egenskapen refererer til leverandøren kontrollen seg selv, under <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID%2A>egenskapen refererer ID.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPointID%2A> property references the ID of the provider's connection point.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>egenskapen refererer til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objekt, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPointID%2A>egenskapen refererer til IDen leverandørens tilkoblingspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPointID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Several properties concern the state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: Flere egenskaper gjelder tilstanden for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A> property indicates whether the connection is active (currently exchanging data) or inactive (still connected but not actively sharing data).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A>egenskapen angir om tilkoblingen er aktiv (for øyeblikket utveksle data) eller inaktiv (fortsatt koblet, men ikke aktivt deling data).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property indicates whether the connection is a shared (available to all users of a page) or a user-specific connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property indicates whether the control is static (declared in the page markup and thus permanent) or dynamic (created programmatically, meaning that it can be deleted).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>egenskapen angir om tilkoblingen er en delt (tilgjengelig for alle brukere på en side) eller en bestemt tilkobling og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>egenskapen angir om kontrollen statisk (deklarert i siden markup og dermed permanent) eller dynamisk (opprettet programmatisk, noe som betyr at den kan slettes).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnection constructor is public so that the ASP.NET parser can create an instance when a connection is declared in the markup of a Web page; this constructor is not intended to be used in developer code.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren WebPartConnection er felles slik at ASP.NET parseren kan opprette en forekomst når en tilkobling er deklarert i koden for en webside; Denne konstruktøren skal ikke brukes i developer kode.

trans-unit.source: When you want to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object programmatically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Når du vil opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objekt programmatisk, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: These methods handle the many details of creating a connection, and return a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene håndtere mange detaljene for å opprette en tilkobling, og returnerer en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnection constructor for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> class sets the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnection konstruktøren for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>klassen angir verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>egenskapene som skal `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: Thus the default state of a new connection is to be static (meaning that it is declared in the markup of the containing Web page) and shared (visible to all users of the page).
trans-unit.target: Dermed standardtilstanden til en ny tilkobling er ikke statisk (det vil si at det er deklarert i markup inneholdende websiden) og delte (vises for alle brukere av siden).

trans-unit.source: This will be the case when you add a connection in the typical scenario, by declaring the connection in the markup of the page with an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil være tilfellet når du legger til en tilkobling i de fleste tilfellet av deklarerer tilkoblingen i koden på siden med en `<asp:webpartconnection>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: However, in other circumstances a connection will have different values for these properties.
trans-unit.target: I andre tilfeller vil imidlertid en tilkobling har forskjellige verdier for disse egenskapene.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you add a connection programmatically by creating the connection object in code, and the user is viewing the page in the default user personalization scope, the connection is created as a dynamic, per-user(visible only to the specific user) connection.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når du legger til en tilkobling programmatisk ved å opprette tilkoblingsobjektet i koden, og brukeren viser siden i standard bruker-område, opprettes tilkoblingen som en dynamisk, per user(visible only to the specific user)-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> properties are read-only, and these properties that determine the nature of a connection are set internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control depending on how a connection is created (declaratively in the page markup, or programmatically through your code or the user interface).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>er skrivebeskyttet, og disse egenskapene som avgjør av en tilkobling er angitt internt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen avhengig av hvordan en tilkobling opprettes (deklarativt i siden markup eller programmatisk via koden eller brukergrensesnittet).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> object that is acting as the consumer control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> objektet som fungerer som forbruker kontrollen i en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls that share data.
trans-unit.target: Hver webdeler tilkobling består av to kontroller som dele dataene.

trans-unit.source: One control acts as the provider of data, and the other control acts as a consumer, receiving and processing the data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Én kontroll fungerer som leverandøren med data, og den andre kontrollen fungerer som forbruker, mottak og behandling av data fra leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: The Consumer property gets a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control acting as a consumer in a connection relationship.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen forbrukeren henter en referanse til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollere fungerer som forbruker i en relasjon for tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that represents the Web Parts control acting as the consumer in a connection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> som representerer webdeler kontrollen fungerer som forbrukeren i en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The length of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID*> property is zero.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID*>egenskapen er null.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a control that is acting as a consumer in a connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som fungerer som et connection point for en kontroll som fungerer som forbruker i en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: One of the required steps for creating a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is to create connection points for each control.
trans-unit.target: Én av de nødvendige trinnene for å opprette en tilkobling mellom to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller er ikke opprette tilkoblingen punkt for hver kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a consumer.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingspunktet forbrukeren er et objekt som inneholder informasjon om hvordan du kobler til kontrollen fungerer som forbruker.

trans-unit.source: In the consumer's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute.
trans-unit.target: De forbrukeren kildekode, må én av metodene identifiseres med den `ConnectionConsumer` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object that is associated with a consumer control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface the method can retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objektet som er knyttet til en Forbrukerkontroll inneholder detaljer om metoden og attributtet, inkludert en ID for metoden et visningsnavn for bruk i brukergrensesnittet (UI), og hvilken type grensesnittet metoden kan hente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: This set of information about the consumer, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it understands, collectively forms a consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: Dette settet med informasjon om forbrukeren, metoden for utgjør tilkoblinger, og hva slags grensesnittet den forstår utgjør samlet tilkoblingspunktet en forbruker.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object can connect to only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object at a time.
trans-unit.target: Som standard et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objekt kan koble til bare én <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objekt om gangen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time.
trans-unit.target: En forbruker kan ha flere metoder identifisert som mulig forbrukeren tilkoblingen punkt, men en forbruker kan bare ha én tilkobling som forbruker (altså bare én av de forbrukeren tilkoblingen punktene kan være aktiv) om gangen.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> can connect to any number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Derimot et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>kan koble til flere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: This default behavior can be changed by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Standardvirkemåten kan endres ved å overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute>attributtet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> associated with the consumer control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> tilknyttet forbrukeren kontrollen i en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the consumer connection point for that connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapsverdien på en tilkobling som refererer til IDen for objektet som betjener som tilkoblingspunktet forbrukeren for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which consumer connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute on the `<asp:webpartconnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan angi tilkoblingspunktet som forbruker brukes for tilkoblingen ved å tilordne en verdi for en statisk tilkobling er angitt i koden for en webside i `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attributtet for den `<asp:webpartconnection>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID> property value is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er tilordnet til attributtet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>egenskapsverdien brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>

trans-unit.source: When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the ConsumerConnectionPointID property.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter dynamiske (programmatisk) tilkoblinger, skal vanligvis du ikke angi verdien for egenskapen ConsumerConnectionPointID.

trans-unit.source: You can simply call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, passing to it the consumer and consumer connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bare kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollere, sende til den forbrukeren og forbrukeren tilkobling peke objekter (sammen med andre nødvendige parameterne), og denne metoden bestemmer riktig ID som brukes for de forbrukeren tilkoblingspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method without needing to specify the ConsumerConnectionPointID property value.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte når du kobler, du kan ringe den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>metoden uten å måtte angi egenskapsverdien ConsumerConnectionPointID.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ID of a consumer's connection point can be determined when you designate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control as a consumer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > IDen til en forbruker tilkoblingspunktet kan bestemmes når du angir en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>eller andre serverkontroll som forbruker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You must identify a method in the consumer that retrieves an instance of an interface furnished by either a provider control or a transformer.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en metode i forbruker som henter en forekomst av et grensesnitt som er angitt av en leverandør kontroll eller en transformering.

trans-unit.source: To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionConsumer` code attribute.
trans-unit.target: For å identifisere metoden, merker du det med den `ConnectionConsumer` code-attributtet.

trans-unit.source: When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the consumer's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til dette attributtet, kan du legge til en valgfri verdi strengparameter som fungerer som en ID for forbrukeren <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the ConsumerConnectionPointID property for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en verdi for den valgfrie parameteren ID, blir denne verdien verdien for egenskapen ConsumerConnectionPointID for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply an ID value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID> property value is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en ID-verdi i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>egenskapsverdien brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID for the consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: Velg en streng som inneholder ID for forbrukeren-tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control acting as a consumer for that connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapsverdien på en tilkobling som refererer til IDen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollere fungerer som forbruker for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The ConsumerID property value is required when you create a connection between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien ConsumerID kreves når du oppretter en tilkobling mellom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to activate the connection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er tilordnet til egenskapen, et unntak når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen prøver å aktivere tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the control acting as a consumer in a connection.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder IDen til kontrollen fungerer som forbruker i en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir IDen for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object has a unique value assigned to its ID property.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objektet har en unik verdi som er tilordnet til ID-egenskap.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: This is to ensure that there is a way to distinguish between multiple connections.
trans-unit.target: Dette er slik at det blir enklere å skille mellom flere tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: If you create a static connection by declaring an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element in a Web page, and you do not assign a value to the `ID` attribute for the connection, an exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to activate the connection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en statisk tilkobling ved deklarerer en `<asp:webpartconnection>` element i en webside, og du ikke tilordne en verdi til den `ID` attributtet for tilkoblingen, et unntak forårsakes når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen prøver å aktivere tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates a new dynamic connection, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicConnectionID%2A> method to generate a unique ID for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen oppretter en ny dynamiske tilkobling, kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicConnectionID%2A>metode for å generere en unik ID for tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicConnectionID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder IDen til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object is currently established and able to exchange data between its provider and consumer controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> -objektet er opprettet, og kan ikke utveksle data mellom leverandør og forbrukeren kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: The IsActive property indicates a state of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsActive angir av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: When the connection is in this state, the provider and consumer controls in the connection are communicating and able to exchange data through a common interface or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: Når tilkoblingen er i denne tilstanden, leverandør og forbrukeren kontrollene i tilkoblingen er kommunikasjon og kan utveksle data via et felles grensesnitt eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: When a user views a rendered page that includes an established connection in normal browse mode, the connection is typically active (unless it failed to be activated due to some conflict or other issue when the page loaded).
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker viser en gjengitte side som inkluderer en opprettet tilkobling normal lesemodus, aktiveres tilkoblingen vanligvis (Hvis den ikke kunne aktiveres på grunn av en konflikt eller et annet problem når laste inn siden).

trans-unit.source: In the early stages of the page and control life cycle, the property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien er i en tidlig fase av siden og kontroll levetid `false`.

trans-unit.source: The connection is activated just after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen aktiveres bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>hendelse på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the connection is activated after the consumer has retrieved an instance of the specified interface from the provider or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt tilkoblingen aktiveres etter at brukeren har hentet en forekomst av det angitte grensesnittet fra leverandøren eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: It is useful to know whether a connection is active in situations where there might be conflicts or synchronization issues due to multiple connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: Det er lurt å vite om en tilkobling er aktiv i tilfeller der det er kanskje konflikter eller synkroniseringsproblemer på grunn av flere tilkoblinger på en side.

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is some kind of conflict between two connections, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has the option of not activating one of the connections to avoid the conflict.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en konflikt mellom to tilkoblinger, for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen har muligheten til å ikke aktivere en tilkoblinger for å unngå konflikten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilkoblingen er aktiv. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object is visible to all users or only to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objektet er synlig for alle brukere eller bare for gjeldende bruker.

trans-unit.source: As with individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object can be a shared or a per-user instance.
trans-unit.target: Som med individuell <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>-objektet kan være en delt eller per brukerforekomst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A shared instance means that the connection is visible to all users of a Web page, and a per-user instance means the connection is visible only to a specific user.
trans-unit.target: En delt forekomst betyr at tilkoblingen er synlig for alle brukere fra en webside og per brukerforekomst betyr at tilkoblingen er bare synlige for en bestemt bruker.

trans-unit.source: In general, the way a connection is added to a page determines whether the connection is shared.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis bestemmer hvordan en tilkobling er lagt til en side om deles tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, then the connection is shared and the IsShared property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingen er deklarert i koden for en webside, og deretter deles tilkoblingen og IsShared egenskapsverdi `true`.

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the Web page is in shared personalization scope when a connection is added, the connection is also shared.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg hvis websiden er i delt område når en tilkobling, deles også tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, when a user uses the `<asp:connectionszone>` user interface (UI) to add a connection, the page is in user personalization scope, so the connection is not shared and the IsShared property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis når en bruker i `<asp:connectionszone>` brukergrensesnittet (UI) for å legge til en tilkobling, siden er i bruker-område, slik at den ikke er delt og IsShared egenskapsverdi `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection is shared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilkoblingen er delt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object is declared in the markup of a Web page, or created programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objektet er deklarert i koden for en webside eller opprettet programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: Connections between Web Parts controls can be either static or dynamic.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblinger mellom webdeler kontroller kan være statisk eller dynamisk.

trans-unit.source: A static connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, using an `<asp:WebPartConnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: En statisk tilkobling er deklarert i koden for en webside ved hjelp av en `<asp:WebPartConnection>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are created programmatically or when a user creates a connection through the user interface (UI) defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Dynamiske tilkoblinger opprettes programmatisk eller når en bruker oppretter en tilkobling via brukergrensesnittet (UI) som er definert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: Static connections are shared objects, meaning they are available to all users of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Statiske tilkoblinger er delt objekter, noe som betyr at de er tilgjengelige for alle brukere av websiden.

trans-unit.source: Also, they are essentially permanent because, like a static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, they cannot be permanently deleted.
trans-unit.target: De er også i hovedsak permanent fordi, som en statisk <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll, de kan bli slettet permanent.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While a static connection object cannot be permanently deleted, it can be permanently disconnected.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Mens en statisk connection-objektet ikke kan slettes permanent, den permanent kan kobles.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the disconnected object would exist on the server, but an end user would never be aware of the object's existence in a page.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet frakoblet objekt vil finnes på serveren, men sluttbrukeren vil aldri være klar over objektets finnes på en side.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection is static; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilkoblingen er statisk; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that acts as the provider in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen som fungerer som leverandøren i en webdeler-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Every Web Parts connection consists of two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls--a consumer and a provider--and the Provider property returns a reference to the provider control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: Hver webdeler tilkobling består av to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller--forbrukere og en leverandør, og egenskapen returnerer en referanse til leverandøren kontrollen i en tilkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Like its counterpart in a connection (the consumer control), the provider control is required to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen leverandøren kreves for å opprette en tilkobling som motparten i en tilkobling (forbrukeren kontrollen).

trans-unit.source: Whether you create the connection programmatically, or by declaring it in page persistence format, you must specify a control to act as the provider for a connection.
trans-unit.target: Om du oppretter tilkoblingen programmatisk eller deklarerer siden utholdenhet format, må du angi en kontroll som leverandøren for en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that acts as the provider of data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> som fungerer som leverandøren av data.

trans-unit.source: The length of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID*> property value is zero.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID*>egenskapsverdien er null.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control acting as a provider for a connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som fungerer som en tilkoblingspunktet for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollere fungerer som en leverandør for en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: One of the required steps for creating a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is to create connection points for each control.
trans-unit.target: Én av de nødvendige trinnene for å opprette en tilkobling mellom to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller er ikke opprette tilkoblingen punkt for hver kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a provider.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingspunktet for tjeneste er et objekt som inneholder informasjon om hvordan du kobler til kontrollen fungerer som en leverandør.

trans-unit.source: In the provider's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionProvider` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Leverandørens kildekode, må én av metodene identifiseres med den `ConnectionProvider` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> that is associated with a provider control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface instance the method can return to a consumer control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>som er knyttet til hos en leverandør av kontrollen inneholder detaljer om metoden og attributtet, inkludert en ID for metoden et visningsnavn for bruk i brukergrensesnittet (UI), og hvilken type grensesnittet forekomsten metoden kan gå tilbake til en Forbrukerkontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: This set of information about the provider, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it provides, collectively forms a provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: Dette settet med informasjon om leverandøren, metoden for utgjør tilkoblinger, og hva slags grensesnittet det gir utgjør samlet et leverandøren connection point.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> can connect to only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object at a time.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>kan koble til bare én <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objekt om gangen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time.
trans-unit.target: En forbruker kan ha flere metoder identifisert som mulig forbrukeren tilkoblingen punkt, men en forbruker kan bare ha én tilkobling som forbruker (altså bare én av de forbrukeren tilkoblingen punktene kan være aktiv) om gangen.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> can connect to any number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objects by default.
trans-unit.target: Derimot et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>kan koble til flere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objekter som standard.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For example, a provider control that provides a postal code could be connected to multiple consumer controls that use a postal code to create various kinds of data based on a postal code, such as weather data, news, and so on.
trans-unit.target: En leverandør kontroll som gir et postnummer kan for eksempel være koblet til flere forbrukerkontroller som bruker et postnummer til å opprette forskjellige typer data basert på et postnummer, for eksempel Vær data, nyheter og så videre.

trans-unit.source: This default behavior can be changed by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Standardvirkemåten kan endres ved å overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute>attributtet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> associated with the provider control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> knyttet til leverandøren kontrollen i en tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the provider connection point for that connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapsverdien på en tilkobling som refererer til IDen for objektet som betjener som tilkoblingspunktet for tjeneste for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which provider connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute on the `<asp:webpartconnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan angi tilkoblingspunktet hvilken leverandør som skal brukes for tilkoblingen ved å tilordne en verdi for en statisk tilkobling er angitt i koden for en webside i `ProviderConnectionPointID` attributtet for den `<asp:webpartconnection>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID> property value is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er tilordnet til attributtet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>egenskapsverdien brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>

trans-unit.source: When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the ProviderConnectionPointID property.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter dynamiske (programmatisk) tilkoblinger, skal vanligvis du ikke angi verdien for egenskapen ProviderConnectionPointID.

trans-unit.source: You can simply call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, passing to it the provider and provider connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the provider's connection point.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bare kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollere, sende til den leverandør og leverandør peke objekter (sammen med andre nødvendige parameterne), og denne metoden bestemmer riktig ID som brukes for leverandørens tilkoblingspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method without needing to specify the ProviderConnectionPointID property value.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte når du kobler, du kan ringe den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>metoden uten å måtte angi egenskapsverdien ProviderConnectionPointID.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ID of a provider's connection point can be determined when you designate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control as a provider.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > IDen til en leverandør tilkoblingspunktet kan bestemmes når du angir en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>eller andre serverkontroll som en leverandør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You must identify a callback method in the provider that serves an instance of an interface containing data to a consumer.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en tilbakeringing metode i leverandøren som brukes som en forekomst av et grensesnitt som inneholder data til en forbruker.

trans-unit.source: To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionProvider` code attribute.
trans-unit.target: For å identifisere metoden, merker du det med den `ConnectionProvider` code-attributtet.

trans-unit.source: When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the provider's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til dette attributtet, kan du legge til en valgfri verdi strengparameter som fungerer som en ID for leverandørens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the ProviderConnectionPointID property for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en verdi for den valgfrie parameteren ID, blir denne verdien verdien for egenskapen ProviderConnectionPointID for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply an ID value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control assigns a default ID when the object is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en ID-verdi i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen tilordner en default-ID når objektet er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID for a provider connection point object.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder IDen for en leverandør connection point-objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control acting as a provider for that connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapsverdien på en tilkobling som refererer til IDen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollere fungerer som en leverandør for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderID property value is required when you create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien ProviderID kreves når du oppretter en tilkobling mellom to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to activate the connection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er tilordnet til egenskapen, et unntak når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen prøver å aktivere tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the provider control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder IDen for leverandøren-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the inherited <xref:System.Object.ToString*> method and returns a short type name for the connection object.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer arvet <xref:System.Object.ToString*>metoden og returnerer typen kort navn for tilkoblingsobjektet.</xref:System.Object.ToString*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used mostly for convenience by control designers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis til foretrekker av kontrollen utviklere.

trans-unit.source: It improves how connection objects appear in Design view by using the shorter type name, as opposed to a fully qualified type name.
trans-unit.target: Det forbedrer hvordan tilkoblingsobjekter vises i utformingsvisning ved hjelp av kortere typenavnet, i motsetning til en fullstendig kvalifisert navn.

trans-unit.source: However, the method can be called at any point in your code where you want to know the type name of a connection object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan imidlertid kalles når som helst i koden der du vil vite typenavnet på en koblingsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the short (unqualified) type name of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder korte (ukvalifiserte) Skriv inn navnet på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object that is used to transform data between two otherwise incompatible connection points in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> objekt som brukes til å omforme data mellom to ellers er inkompatible tilkoblingen punktene i en webdeler-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: In a Web Parts connection, there are two ways in which the provider and consumer controls in the connection can connect.
trans-unit.target: Det er to måter leverandør og forbrukeren kontrollene i tilkoblingen kan koble til i en webdeler-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: They can connect directly, through their respective <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> objects and an interface type that is understood by both controls.
trans-unit.target: De kan koble direkte til de respektive <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>objekter og en grensesnittype som forstå for begge kontrollene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: Or, if they are incompatible, they can connect indirectly, using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object that transforms an interface instance from a provider into a type understood by a consumer.
trans-unit.target: Eller, hvis de er kompatible, de kan koble til indirekte, med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>objektet som transformerer en grensesnittet forekomst fra en leverandør til en type forstått av en forbruker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: When a transformer is needed as part of a connection, the Transformer property provides a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du trenger en transformering som en del av en tilkobling, egenskapen transformeringen inneholder en referanse til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: You can add a transformer for a connection declaratively in the markup of a Web page, by adding a tag for a custom transformer (or one of the transformers provided with the Web Parts control set) within the `<asp:WebPartConnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til en transformering for en tilkobling deklarativt i koden for en webside ved å legge til en kode for en egendefinert transformering (eller en transformeringer gav webdeler kontrollen settet) i den `<asp:WebPartConnection>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: You can also add a transformer programmatically, creating an instance of it in your code, and calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer%29> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to create the connection, passing to it the transformer object along with the other required parameters.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også legge til en transformering programmatisk å opprette en forekomst av den i koden, og kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer%29>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen ikke opprette tilkoblingen sende til den transformeringen objektet sammen med de nødvendige parameterne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects used internally by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> objekter som er brukt internt av webdeler kontrollen settet.

trans-unit.source: The Transformers property is never intended for use by developers.
trans-unit.target: Transformeringer egenskapen ikke er ment for bruk av utviklere.

trans-unit.source: To access the transformer associated with a connection, developers should always use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til transformeringen knyttet til en tilkobling, utviklere alltid skal bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformer%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Transformers property is used internally by the Web Parts control set to enable page developers to declare transformer elements within the `<asp:webpartconnection>` element in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen transformeringer er brukt internt av webdeler kontrollen angitt slik at siden utviklere kan deklarere transformeringen elementer i den `<asp:webpartconnection>` elementet i koden for en webside.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref> containing <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"> </xref> som inneholder <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> objekter.
